      • capUpdatesPerSecond

        public boolean capUpdatesPerSecond
        True if there should be no more updates than the target FPS (i.e. avoids fluctuations between 60 and 61 FPS)

      • errorOnFrameDrop

        public boolean errorOnFrameDrop
        True if an error should be logged when frames a dropped

      • foregroundFPS

        public int foregroundFPS
        Sets the target framerate for the application. The CPU sleeps as needed. Must be positive. Use 0 to never sleep. Default is 0.

        public Lwjgl3Mini2DxWindowListener windowListener
